name: Solana Shield
description:: Protect your SOL address by auto-transferring any Solana that enters your wallet.

AUTH_ENABLED.description: Secure auth. Keep as true unless you know what you're doing.

NETWORK.description: Solana network that you'd like to use.

SHIELDED_ACCOUNT_PRIVATE_KEY.description: This is your SOL Wallet Private Key that you want to shield.

RECOVERY_ACCOUNT_ADDRESS.description: This is your SOL Wallet Public Key that you want to send funds to.

PUSH_NOTIFICATIONS.description: Do you want Push Notifs enabled? true for yes, false for no.

PUSHOVER_TOKEN.description: This is the Public Solana Shield Pushover token. You can change it to your own if you'd like.

SMS_NOTIFICATIONS.description: Twilio SMS Notifications. true for yes, false for no.

TWILIO_TO_NUMBER.description: The phone number you'd like to send SMS notifications to.
